title: My friend lives with me, if he does something sinful am I accountable for it? assim al hakeem
transcript: my question to the share is uh concerning um a friend of mine who comes here to take his s basically he's sleeping here since the Ramadan almost started he sleeps here we eat like he eat here s and everything I wanted to to ask um I live with my big brother it's a two room apartment my friend is in the living room no problem uh I'm just asking if he does things for example let's say he's using his phone and he talks to or he watch some movies on his phone or stuff like that what is my responsibility based on that or like am I sinful if he does these things because he's in my house like what's the what's the responsibility there these things are done privately so this is between him and Allah however if you're sitting with him in the living room and he's chitchatting with Anam or he's watching a movie and you're listening to what's he's watching which is Haram this is where you have to step in and say don't do this please because this is Haram and I cannot assist you on Haram whether it's in your home or when wherever you are this is forbidding evil and vice but if he's putting his earphones and watching a movie on his own this is between him and Allah it's not my um own problem and also if he's chitchatting with anah without me listening or being aware of it this is between him and uh Allah and Allah Knows Best
